name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior DevOps Engineer with 10+ years of experience in driving efficient software delivery and operational excellence. Proficient in **AWS**, **Azure**, **Kubernetes**, **OpenShift**, **CI/CD** practices, **Jenkins**, and **Git** to streamline development workflows and enhance system reliability. Deep understanding of **Linux** environments, **Networking** concepts, and infrastructure automation technologies such as **Ansible** and **Chef**. Skilled in using programming languages like **Python**, **Golang**, and **Ruby** to develop scalable DevOps solutions, and experienced in leveraging **Docker** and container orchestration for high-performance deployments.

Demonstrated success in implementing best practices in DevOps while leading cross-functional teams to foster a culture of collaboration and continuous improvement. Proven problem-solver with a commitment to building secure, maintainable systems that adhere to compliance standards. Passionate about optimizing system performance and driving real-world impact through effective communication and a proactive approach.

experience.responsibilities:
•	Implemented enterprise-level DevOps pipelines using **GitHub Actions**, **Azure DevOps**, and **CircleCI**, incorporating linting, testing, security scans, and multi-environment deployments for both web and API services, resulting in a **40%** reduction in deployment times.
•	Designed and maintained cloud infrastructure leveraging **AWS** and **Azure**, optimizing resource allocation and reducing costs by **30%** through effective utilization of services.
•	Led the re-architecture of applications to microservices-based architectures using **Kubernetes** and **Docker**, enhancing scalability and resilience by **50%** during peak traffic.
•	Automated configuration management using tools like **Ansible** and **Chef**, streamlining server provisioning and application deployment processes.
•	Collaborated with cross-functional teams to resolve operational issues, ensuring uptime and reliability through rigorous monitoring and log analysis on **Linux** systems.
•	Implemented CI/CD best practices for continuous integration and deployment, using **Jenkins** and version control systems like **Git** to maintain code quality and streamline development processes.
•	Established comprehensive networking strategies and configurations to support seamless communication between distributed services and enhance system performance.
•	Developed and documented standard operating procedures for system maintenance, backups, and disaster recovery plans to ensure operational continuity.
•	Provided mentoring and training to junior engineers on **DevOps** practices and tools, enhancing team skills and productivity.
•	Solved complex infrastructure-related problems with innovative solutions that improved system reliability and reduced downtime.

Implemented and maintained **CI/CD** pipelines using **Jenkins** and **Git**, enhancing deployment efficiency by **50%** and reducing rollback incidents to below **5%**.
Managed infrastructure as code with **Ansible** and **Chef**, streamlining the provisioning process which reduced server setup time by **30%**.
Configured and optimized **Linux** servers for application deployments, ensuring high availability and performance across **AWS** and **Azure** cloud environments.
Leveraged **Kubernetes** for container orchestration, achieving seamless scaling of applications while lowering operational costs by **20%**.
Designed and executed disaster recovery plans that ensured **99.9%** uptime for critical systems, utilizing **OpenStack** for virtualization.
Conducted network performance tuning, enhancing throughput and minimizing latency for application traffic by **15%**.
Developed monitoring and alerting systems using **Prometheus** and **Grafana**, enabling real-time visibility into application health and system metrics, promoting proactive incident management.
Fostered a culture of continuous improvement and collaboration by enhancing communication across cross-functional teams, contributing to improved problem-solving strategies and operational excellence.

- Implemented **CI/CD** practices using **Jenkins** to automate deployment pipelines, improving deployment speed by **30%** while minimizing downtime.
- Managed infrastructure using **Ansible** and **Chef**, ensuring consistent environment configurations and reducing setup time by **50%**.
- Optimized system performance on **Linux** servers, leading to a **20%** reduction in resource usage and enhancing the overall efficiency of application hosting.
- Conducted networking solutions to enhance connectivity and reliability, achieving **99.9%** uptime across applications.
- Developed and maintained scripts in **Python** and **Golang** to automate monitoring and reporting, significantly reducing manual intervention.
- Deployed and managed container orchestration with **Kubernetes** to facilitate microservices architecture, resulting in easier scaling and deployment of applications.
- Collaborated effectively across teams, demonstrating strong **communication** and **problem-solving** skills to troubleshoot and resolve infrastructure issues promptly.
- Leveraged cloud services, including **AWS** and **Azure**, to architect and maintain scalable, reliable environments, leading to improved operational efficiency by **25%**.
- Integrated third-party services, like **Artifactory** and **Git**, for version control and artifact management to streamline the development workflow.
- Played a pivotal role in implementing security best practices using **RBAC** and **OAuth 2.0**, ensuring compliance with GDPR and safeguarding user data.
